turns.content: There may be many individuals named Emanuele Pasqualotto in Italy. Without more specific information, it is difficult to determine which Emanuele Pasqualotto you are referring to.

Thank you for providing more information. There is a researcher named Emanuele Pasqualotto who has worked at the University of Tübingen in Germany. He is currently an Associate Professor in the Department of Cognitive Psychology at the University of Würzburg in Germany. His research focuses on visual perception and attention, and he has published several articles in peer-reviewed journals. If you have any further questions or are looking for specific information about this researcher, I suggest you consult his official webpage or contact him directly.

Yes, Emanuele Pasqualotto's official webpage can be found at the following URL:

<https://www.psychologie.uni-wuerzburg.de/en/abteilungen/allgemeine-psychologie-ii/staff/emanuele-pasqualotto/>

This page contains information about his research interests, publications, and contact information.
